main event: An unidentified flying object was tracked by radar in Hourn, Alabama on 31 November 1957 before disappearing from the screen.
interesting points: The radar indicated a target measuring 15 miles long and 10 miles wide,No visual confirmation was made of the object,The radar contact was lost at the same time from all observing sites,Airman Wright observed a bright white light traveling at approximately 1500 knots prior to disappearing,The report concluded with insufficient data to classify the object.
witness description: observers on duty, including Airman First Class Wright
